info.author: Jonathan Ellis
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Marvin is a program to help molecular biologists when designing protein
constructs (truncated versions of proteins of interest).  It designs the
PRC primers needed to amplify the chosen constructs, and provides tools
for restriction enzyme based cloning, LIC cloning and site directed
mutagenesis.
info.name: marvin
info.summary: A program to aid crystallography construct design.
info.html_description: Marvin is a program to help molecular biologists when designing protein constructs (truncated versions of proteins of interest). It designs the PRC primers needed to amplify the chosen constructs, and provides tools for restriction enzyme based cloning, LIC cloning and site directed mutagenesis.
